title: Command Center (beta)
description: Launch orchestrator missions from one objective, then use operator controls for manual swarm intervention.

runs.title: Runs
runs.noRuns: No runs yet for this project.

objective.title: Objective
objective.placeholder: Describe the task. The orchestrator will plan, delegate workers/reviewers/testers, then execute after your single approval.

status.title: Live Status
status.safetyNote: Default safety: plan preview first, then one-click approval to execute.

advanced.routingNote: Agent model routing is applied to newly launched swarm runs from this page.
advanced.controlsNote: Advanced Controls are for operator workflows: manual spawn, approval triage, mission/instance cancellation, and forensic exports.
